line_1: Tight was her length of stays, and she was tall and lean.
line_2: Erect she stood, she walk'd with stately mien,

line_1: You flout the fat, because yourself are lean:
line_2: Friend, friend, you're warm — why this is downright spleen,

line_1: Pride may be pamper'd while the flesh grows lean;
line_2: Humility may cloath an English Dean;

line_1: Who o'er the rail of garden arbour lean,
line_2: The small-eyed beauty with her Mandarin,

line_1: "O when, sweet lassie, ye're your leane,
line_2: The stranger rises to be geane,

line_1: And pausing hedgers on their mattocks lean.
line_2: Straight every housewife at her door is seen,

line_1: A broken Flute upon his Arm shall lean.
line_2: With gentle Step precede the solemn Train;

line_1: With arms protended o'er the verge they lean,
line_2: The promptitude of friendship in their mien.
